bwwExcerpt: "Burt Bacharach is back on Broadway, and his music for "Promises,  Promises"  --  which he wrote in 1968 with lyricist Hal David and  bookwriter Neil Simon  --  sounds just as good and bright and joyfully  tuneful as it did back in 1968. Sean Hayes, from "Will and Grace," makes  a smashingly good Broadway debut as the likable nebbish of a leading  man.
